objects.specification: A rectangular floor slab measuring approximately six meters in width by four meters in depth, with a slightly darker wood‐finish tone that provides a rich and natural texture underfoot. The surface is smooth and matte, evoking the subtle grain patterns of polished hardwood, and transitions seamlessly to support all booth elements. It sits flush with the ground to create a level platform for visitor traffic.

A broad vertical panel spanning the full six‐meter width, finished in a neutral light color that reflects ambient light softly. The surface is smooth and unadorned, serving as a clean backdrop for branding or display elements. It rises to three meters in height to enclose the rear of the booth and define the exhibit space.

children.specification: An elongated rectangular banner in a vibrant color gradient, suspended slightly above the wall surface. It features bold, eye‐catching graphics with a glossy finish. The banner is gently inclined forward to face attendees entering the booth.

objects.specification: A slender side wall panel finished in the same neutral light tone, offering subtle support for peripheral displays. The vertical surface is smooth and consistent, neatly framing the left boundary of the booth area.

children.specification: A bold banner with a high‐contrast palette, fashioned as an elongated rectangle and hung from the top edge of the left wall. It is slightly tilted inward for maximum visibility as visitors enter the booth.

objects.specification: A matching side wall panel on the right, painted in the same neutral hue to maintain a cohesive enclosure. Its smooth surface provides a subtle frame for the exhibit layout.

children.specification: A brightly colored banner with an engaging pattern, mounted at the top of the right wall and inclined toward the center of the booth for optimal legibility and impact.

objects.specification: A sleek registration desk finished in a vibrant accent color to draw visitor attention. It measures one and a half meters across and features a smooth, slightly glossy surface. The design is minimalist, with clean straight lines and a sturdy plinth base.

A vibrant display stand with a bold painted finish, measuring one meter wide by half a meter deep. The top surface is flat and sturdy, ideal for brochures or product samples. The stand has a subtle beveled edge for a refined look.

A small round table with a slender cylindrical base and a smooth, neutral finish. The top is matte and slightly reflective, blending functionality with understated elegance. It provides seating space for four visitors.
A visitor seating chair with an ergonomic curved back and slender legs, finished in a neutral tone. The seat is gently contoured for comfort and the overall form is lightweight yet sturdy.
